Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Ashburn in 1981...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1984, off Fredrick Nottingham (HAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1984, off Stephen Hanchett (HAL)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Lynchburg on 4/23/1984...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1984, hitting .313 with 18 HR, 92 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 7/31/1985...
Injured on 4/4/1987 with a Sore Knee, out for one week...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1987, hitting .309 with 10 HR, 26 RBI...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1988, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Halifax on 5/16/1990...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/7/1991, hitting .375 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1991, hitting .344 with 4 HR, 22 RBI...
